Text:
Title....: Tora! Tora! Tora!
IMDb......: http://imdblight.com/id/a1UkeXlcPkNifXQE-Tora_Tora_Tora
Genres...: Action, Adventure, Drama, History, War
Year.....: 1970
Rating...: 7.4/10 with 5,945 ratings
Plot.....: In 1941 the Japanese are at odds with the United States on a number of issues which they are attempting to resolve via their Washington embassy. In case this diplomacy fails, the military are hatching plans for a surprise early Sunday morning air attack on the U.S. base at Pearl Harbour. American intelligence is breaking the Japanese diplomatic messages but few high-ups are prepared to believe that an attack is likely, let alone where or how it might come.
Runtime..: 144 minutes
Filmed in: USA
Languages: English, Japanese
We simply was caught with our underwear hanging down around our ankles...total surprise?  I do not believe this...even Billy Mitchell knew this was coming in 39' & no one listened to him then.
the other story is that the US wanted this to happen so profit could be made going into war.
